item.title: Columbia Psychology Lab Preview
item.description:
Welcome! The Columbia Psychology Lab Preview is scheduled for September 15th, 4:30 - 6:00 pm outside Schermerhorn Hall. Click the button below to add the event to your Google Calendar
We believe that the chance to participate in research is one of the best opportunities that our department has to offer. By joining a lab, you will see how research projects are developed, how data is analyzed, and how presentations are put together for conferences and publication.
